==Thoughts==
{{All Schemes to Know Explanation|name=Anand}}
:{{A|VO Anand All Schemes to Know 01.ogg}} '''Anand:''' (Instead of pinning my hopes on the Akademiya, I should rely on my own two hands.)

==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue start}}
:'''Anand:''' Taking care of every ship going through the port is a must.
:{{DIcon}} Hello.
::'''Anand:''' Hello. Did you get here on a ship?
::'''Anand:''' If the vessel needs maintenance, please come see me.
::'''Anand:''' I take care of every ship going through the port.
::{{DIcon}} Good job.
::'''Anand:''' It's part of what I do.
::'''Anand:''' The only concern I have is manpower shortage.
::'''Anand:''' The competition between caravans has caused many artisans like us to change line of work.
::'''Anand:''' But I won't leave, for my lover is a seafarer, so I understand how important ship safety is.
::'''Anand:''' I heard there's an agency called the [[Communications Office]] in [[Liyue]] that specializes in overseas shipping logistics.
::'''Anand:''' Don't you think that would solve the problem of cutthroat competition?
:{{DIcon}} See you.
::'''Anand:''' Yeah, see you.
{{Dialogue end}}
